in anathuruwa awastha kihipayakadima polispathiwaraya thamagen paliganimata uthsaha kara athi bawata karunu dakwa athi jyeshta polis adhikariwaraya jathika polis komishan sabhawen thamata laba dun wada balana niyojya polispathi dhuraya polispathiwaraya kriyathmaka nokirimen allas panathe 70 wani waganthiye sandahan paridi rajya niladhariyaku washayen nithyanukulawa kala yuthu kriyawak sidu nokaramin ‘dushana‘ nam warada sidu karanu laba athayi da sandahan kara thibenawa.

ohoma ba putha.dan loku lamayek, wagakim bara aragena wada karanna ooni, okkoma gedara ammayi thaththayi karanakan balan inne nathiwa.kammale ballage kan deka monada welalune ithin ara hamadama yakada thalana sadde ahala.amma hamadama dana rekod eka hasiyata ahalama epa wela thiyenne.dannam kanath hodata padam wela thiyenne hasiyage.deweni wornin eka labenna issella birinda lagin nagitala giya balanna budu pahanata mokada wela thiyenne kiyala balanna.haba nennam wada koranne na nowa.balamuko eeketh hati.amunala karala hasiya onna budu pahanata mokada wela thiyenne kiyala paryeshanayak kola.parikshanaya : budu pahana wenath holdar ekakata sawikara balima.
